name: The Cursed Wheep
description:
Help the Wolf and the Sheep break the curse in the mysterious forest, in this simple yet amusing platformer developed by BGDC. Brave the dangers with the Wolf and embrace life with the Sheep, solve puzzles, and finally seperate the Wolf and the Sheep for their own good.

Controls:
A - Move left
D - Move right
S - Fall down
W / Space - Jump
Q - Switch
Esc - Pause

Credits:
Christopher Fendika Lee - Programmer
Audrey Levina - Programmer
Jeffryco Ardiya - Game Designer
Oliver Kane - Game Designer
Nayra Jannatri - 2D Artist
Dheanandri - 2D Artist
Willie Soo - Sound Artist
